# deunicode

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This is a wrapper around the rust crate deunicode: https://docs.rs/deunicode/latest/deunicode/

## Installation

``` r
devtools::install_github("Close-your-eyes/deunicode")
```

## Example

```{r example}
# library(deunicode)
deunicode::deunicode(x = c("näme1",
                           "næme2",
                           "nameç",
                           "北亰",
                           "げんまい茶",
                           "🦄☣",
                           "…",
                           "ᔕᓇᓇ"))
```
